com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view
Class RotatedLayout

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.FrameLayout
              com.metaio.cloud.plugin.view.RotatedLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
public class RotatedLayout
extends android.widget.FrameLayout

This class provides functionality to dynamically change the orientation of a FrameLayout while keeping the Activity orientation to landscape
